title: KKBOX-Free Download · Unlimited Music. Let's music

The permission is only used to integrate the telecommunication companies system and to determine the network status when you log in.◎ To allow KKBOX to access photos, media, and files on your device：KKBOX needs the “Storage” permission to process temporary files of songs and album covers.Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KKBOXMore discount or special offer: https://www.kkbox.com/
descriptionHTML:
Everything sounds right. Register KKBOX to enjoy free trial now!
Indulge in 40 million tracks online or offline anytime, anywhere. Let’s music!

【Over 40 million Tracks】Comprehensive music library with various genre and moods. Enjoy unlimited music online or offline, also from multiple devices.
【Personalised Recommendations】Song recommendations based on your listening history that will definitely give you eargasms!
【High-quality Sound】320kbps quality with DTS surround support to indulge your ears with immersive music.
【KKBOX LIVE】Live streaming of various concerts with the best audio and video effects.
【Upgraded ""Listen With"" Feature】""Audio Broadcast"" - You can now listen to your favorite DJs speak while enjoying music with them.
【Premium Exclusive】Unlimited special offers and discounts only for Premium members.
【Music Recognition】Identify any unfamiliar tunes within seconds!
------------------------------------------------------------
Permissions Requested by KKBOX
◎ To allow KKBOX to make and manage phone calls and get contacts：KKBOX will not place any call on your behalf or access your contacts. The permission is only used to integrate the telecommunication companies system and to determine the network status when you log in.
◎ To allow KKBOX to access photos, media, and files on your device：KKBOX needs the “Storage” permission to process temporary files of songs and album covers.

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KKBOX
More discount or special offer: https://www.kkbox.com/
comments: 整体来说是蛮满意的只是不明白为什么所有的歌都变成了30秒的? 就应为这一方面的问题弄的有点不大喜欢了~ 新歌方面有点少但还行啦 ~
I am running kkbox on pixel 2, the apps always quit itself after a few songs are played. The phone itself is running spotify probably without quiting itself. Please help and fix!
Doesn't work very well with android and Google cast. Either can't detect speakers or the connection drops
Lacks basic add song to now playing feature.
Great app but its very difficult to edit my playlist on my tablet... hope the team can fix it..
用了一個月左右突然說我所在的地區不能用...? 我什麼都沒做過。為什麼突然不能在香港用呢?
